channel.title: CVE Feed for Lenderd -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Lenderd -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-32581|2024-08-02T02:13:39.887Z -- lenderd -- mortgage%20calculators%20wp
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Lenderd Mortgage Calculators WP allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Mortgage Calculators WP: from n/a through 1.56.

item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Lenderd Mortgage Calculators WP allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Mortgage Calculators WP: from n/a through 1.56.
